title: Educational Course on Formal Definitions of Extremes and Cognitive Load Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of calculus and experience in constructing logical proofs
context.additional_context: Cognitive load analysis through smartphone-based surveys and project execution

learning_goals: Learners understand the formal definition of limits and can explain logical proof processes
Learners can quantitatively assess their learning difficulty level using a cognitive load measurement survey tool
Learners can establish personalized learning strategies (time management, concept chunking, etc.) based on analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
